welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Limerick, a charming city known for its rich history and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Limerick has to offer during your stay. We hope you have a memorable experience in our beautiful city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for private and charter flights and offers a more exclusive and personalized experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The newest terminal at PHL, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at PHL, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at PHL, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at North Philadelphia Airport is where passengers can check in for flights to destinations outside of the United States.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.
